charges.charge_description: 18:661 LARCENY W/IN SPECIAL MARITIME JURISDICTION, 7/22/96, Ct 1 (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: FIFTEEN (15) days Imprisonment as to Count 1 of the Amended Information, with credit for time served; ONE (01) year Supervised Release; Fine: $225.00 due within 1 year in such amounts and at such times as determined by Probation; Restitution: $765.00; SA: $25.00; MITTIMUS: Forthwith; 12/12/96-Order to Show Cause Why Supervised Release Should Not be Revoked-NINE (09) months Imprisonment with credit for time served; RECOMMENDATION: That the defendant be considered for placement in a community correction center such as Miller Hale during the last 3 months of confinement if a viable release plan is not available to him; All other terms as previously imposed (1s)

FIFTEEN (15) days Imprisonment as to Count 1 of the Amended Information, with credit for time served; ONE (01) year Supervised Release; Fine: $225.00 due within 1 year in such amounts and at such times as determined by Probation; Restitution: $765.00; SA: $25.00; MITTIMUS: Forthwith; 12/12/96-Order to Show Cause Why Supervised Release Should Not be Revoked-NINE (09) months Imprisonment with credit for time served; RECOMMENDATION: That the defendant be considered for placement in a community correction center such as Miller Hale during the last 3 months of confinement if a viable release plan is not available to him; All other terms as previously imposed (2s)
